name: FLYIRE 2D
description:
Tap Tap Drift, either Upward or Downward.

Fly, Collect Stars, and survive to unlock new Skins, Drift Effects, Health Upgrades and new Map Snow!

How to Play:

Android:

Tap on the right or left side of the screen to move downward or upward respectively. You can double-tap on the sides to move in corresponding directions.

Standalone (Win, MacX, Linux)

Use Right and Left Arrow keys to move downward and upward respectively
